participant_1.background:
I ve started creating my own comics and presenting them to publishers.
I ve been rejected several times and thought of giving up with this.
And also love drawing.
I love comics.
I decided to publish my creations on internet.

participant_2.background:
I sit on my computer for several hours a day.
I enjoy learning about other cultures.
I m bored with my current lifestyle.
I watch foreign movies and tv shows.
I wish i could speak another language.

content.text: Hello! I'm Izzy.
Hi Izzy, I'm Daniel.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to learn about other cultures and watch foreign movies and TV shows.
That's cool! I like to do that too. I also love comics and drawing.
I've never been much of a comic reader, but I do enjoy drawing.
Have you ever tried making your own comics?
No, I haven't. I've always wanted to try, but I'm not very good at drawing.
You should give it a try! I'm not very good at it either, but it's a lot of fun.
Maybe I will. Thanks for the suggestion!
No problem! So, what are some of your favorite foreign movies and TV shows?
I really like the anime series "Attack on Titan" and the Korean drama "Crash Landing on You."
I've heard good things about both of those. I've been meaning to check them out.
You should! They're both really good.
I will! Thanks for the recommendations!
No problem! So, what are you up to today?
Not much. I'm just working on my latest comic book.
Oh, that's cool! What's it about?
It's about a group of superheroes who are trying to save the world from an evil alien invasion.
That sounds awesome! I'd love to read it when it's finished.
Thanks! I'll let you know when it's ready.
Cool! So, what's your favorite thing about comics?
I love the way they can tell a story in a visually interesting way.
Me too! I think comics are a great way to tell stories that would be difficult to tell in other formats.
I agree! I love the way that comics can be so expressive and creative.
Me too! I think comics are a great art form.
I agree! I'm so glad I met you, Daniel. We seem to have a lot in common.
Me too! I'm glad I met you too, Izzy
